attributes.action: Appeal to MPs to veto European Union extrication legislation
attributes.additional_details: Whilst we recognise more must be done to establish a cohesive European Union, we believe we are better placed within it to tackle important issues that affect not only the citizens of the UK but citizens of all nations from across the globe.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe the case put forward to British citizens regarding leaving the European Union was largely misleading and fraudulent in nature.
We therefore appeal to MPs to vote inline with SMPs and veto legislation that could lead to the extrication of Britain from the EU.
